description: BUFR/CREX Table B - Classification of elements
entries: Identifies origin and type of data
Defines geographical position, including horizontal derivatives, in association with Class 06 (first dimension of horizontal space)
Defines geographical position, including horizontal derivatives, in association with Class 05 (second dimension of horizontal space)
Defines height, altitude, pressure level, including vertical derivatives of position
Height, altitude, pressure and derivatives observed or measured, not defined as a vertical location
Defines present/past weather, special phenomena, etc.
Defines time and time derivatives that are not coordinates
Defines geographical positions, in conjunction with Class 28, that are not coordinates
Defines geographical positions, in conjunction with Class 27, that are not coordinates
Elements used in conjunction with data description operators
